      • setFrameRate

        public void setFrameRate​(int fps)
        set max frame rate for character canvas drawing.
        Parameters:
        fps - max frames per second

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • syncBuffer

        public void syncBuffer()

        try to avoid using this.

        syncs buffers for when clear is not being called every frame. should be used if there is any movement between frames. warning, this is volatile! could cause screen tearing if called often.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Wipes the buffer entirely replacing with empty chars. Normally this should be called on the start of every frame.

      • setColor

        public void setColor​(int color_in)
        set brush color for draw operations.
        Parameters:
        color_in - index of color.

      • setBrush

        public void setBrush​(char brush_in)
        set the brush character for draw operations.
        Parameters:
        brush_in - character to draw.

      • line

        public void line​(int x,
                 int y,
                 int l,
                 boolean vertical)
        Draws a vertical or horizontal line using the brush settings.
        Parameters:
        x - x position of top/left.
        y - y position of top/left.
        l - length, extends towards positive x/y depending on orientation.
        vertical - orientation of the line, true for vertical, false for horizontal.

      • rect

        public void rect​(int x,
                 int y,
                 int w,
                 int h,
                 boolean filled)
        Fills a region with the brush settings.
        Parameters:
        x - x position of top/left.
        y - y position of top/left.
        w - width of rect.
        h - height of rect.
        filled - whether or not the interior is filled (false for only the boarder).

      • point

        public void point​(int x,
                  int y)
        Paints a single point with the brush settings.
        Parameters:
        x - x of point.
        y - y of point.

      • drawPerimieter

        public void drawPerimieter​(int x,
                           int y,
                           int w,
                           int h)
        draws an unfilled rect using ASCII border chars
        Parameters:
        x - x position of top/left.
        y - y position of top/left.
        w - width of rect.
        h - height of rect.
